com.engine.entity

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.engine.coreObject.CoreObject
      • com.engine.entity.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Player

    public class Entity
extends CoreObject

    Entity

    An entity is a core object that is typically "alive". An entity can be a player, an ally, an enemy, etc.

    Basic Functionality:

    The entity class is a bridge for entities between it and a core object. Most of an entity's functionality comes from the Core Object class. This class contains "special" parameters specific to entities. Such as entity type (friendly, enemy), and ai data.

    Author:
    Ryan Hochmuth
